document_data.name: Tabast Dauntrael
document_data.mainbody: '''Tabast Dauntrael''' was a member of the [[Dauntrael]] clan of mages. He hired himself out as a [[mage]] and guard in the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Both Tabast and his sister, [[Tethlae Dauntrael]], provided "mageguard" services based out of Priapurl as of {{yearlink|1370}}, for packages being shipped between the [[Sword Coast]] and the [[Inner Sea]], and for caravans.
document_data.Abilities: They employed a long-range, long-duration version of ''[[project image|projected image]]'' to track what they guarded; the spell effect could not just be their eyes and ears, but also cast spells in preparation for their arrival through ''teleportation''. They also had spells to transform and disguise themselves.
document_data.Possessions: They had a complement of [[wand]]s, [[ring]]s and [[staff|staves]] they could use in whirlwind attacks.
